Summary: Large Brighte headlight in the sky that wobbled, increased in speed,
divs: sighting detailswalking the dogs this morning and noticed a bright light in the sky. it was like an headlight\searchlight from an helicopter. the object was brighter than venus and much bigger. no noise and seemed to wobble slightly. it travelled south east and flew directly over head. the shape and intensity didn't change. there were no flashing lights. watched the object for about 5 mins. after flying over head it appeared to speed up and then entered some clouds which seemed very high and never reappeared.
